Author: Leonidas
Content:
Some of you who applied to other programs besides the Y probably got invites during the summer to meet up with those people and other entrepreneurs. Anyone going?

If so, we should hold a mini get together or something. It'll be fun. Three trips planned in one summer, its a lot of money but it's not everyday you get the opportunity to meet exciting people

Author: Leonidas
Title: Anyone going to the "Invite only" Y-combinator 'wannabe' programs?

Author: gyro_robo
Content:
I see event #2 is "Drinking beer". So in the "Search for events" I type "beer".

Sorry we didn't understand what you meant by search for events beer, try using "in beer"

So I search for "in beer".

Search result "for events in beer" yeilded 0 match(es)

Keep working on it.
